channel.title: Comments on: Death of Sexy: Some Candy

item.title: By: Your Anomalous Fan
item.dc:creator: Your Anomalous Fan
item.description: WTF? It's a nylon bikini and wristwarmers that retails for over $40? Forget film, I'm going into the "Sexy $X Costume" business. That has to be about a 40,000% markup on the amount of fabric and child labor that went into that outfit.
item.content:encoded: WTF? It’s a nylon bikini and wristwarmers that retails for over $40? Forget film, I’m going into the “Sexy $X Costume” business. That has to be about a 40,000% markup on the amount of fabric and child labor that went into that outfit.
